message: Let's be fair, I'll get a bit more
I understand you want a larger share, but waiting longer hurts you more than me. Let's be reasonable.
I'll reduce my share a bit, but I still think I deserve more
This seems like a fair compromise, Alice.  Every round that passes makes the deal worse for both of us, especially you.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I should get more. Inflation is hurting me more than you
Alice, this is the best offer you'll get.  We're running out of time, and the inflation is only getting worse.
